Class.Name: InputHandlerNodeable
Class.Description: Handle processed input events found in input binding assets

Output.Name: Pressed
Output.Description: Signaled when the input event begins.

Output.Name: Held
Output.Description: Signaled while the input event is active.

Output.Name: Released
Output.Description: Signaled when the input event ends.

Property.Name: Event Name
Property.Description: The input event name as defined in an inputbinding asset. Example 'Fireball'
